refnamediv.refpurpose: Reduces the vector to a single value using a callback function

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
callback
mixedcallback mixedcarry mixedvalue
carry
The return value of the previous callback, or initial if it's the first iteration.
value
The value of the current iteration.
initial
The initial value of the carry value. Can be &null;.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
The return value of the final callback.
